mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEARCH_H ( SEQ, SEARCH_WORD, S_ID, SDATE, SEX, AREA, BIRTH ) VALUES ( SEQ_SEARCH.NEXTVAL, #{search_word}, #{s_id}, SYSDATE, ( select NULL SEX from dual where not exists (SELECT SEX FROM USER_H WHERE ID=#{s_id}) union SELECT SEX FROM USER_H WHERE ID=#{s_id} ), ( select NULL AREA from dual where not exists (SELECT AREA FROM USER_H WHERE ID=#{s_id}) union SELECT AREA FROM USER_H WHERE ID=#{s_id} ), ( select NULL BIRTH from dual where not exists (SELECT BIRTH FROM USER_H WHERE ID=#{s_id}) union SELECT BIRTH FROM USER_H WHERE ID=#{s_id} ) )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.CNT AS CNT, A.SEARCH_WORD FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT, SEARCH_WORD FROM SEARCH_H GROUP BY SEARCH_WORD ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 9
